name: hubot-ibmcloud-cognitive-lib
description: Provides cognitive libraries to assist Hubot developers to interpret natural language.

scripts.coverage: . test/.env && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage-local: . test/.env && istanbul cover -x '**/tools/**' --include-all-sources --report lcov --report cobertura --report text --dir ./gh-pages/coverage _mocha -- test

author: ibm-cloud-solutions
